description:
Ultra-realistic physics, beautiful sceneries and different balls with their own characteristics make Bocce the most realistic Bocce/Petanque simulation available on Shop.

-3 AI Levels in single player mode
-Local two players mode
-Hyper-intuitive controls
-Point or shoot
-Throw sitting or standing 
-Make lobs
-Choose amongst 6 sceneries and 6 balls
name: Bocce
